name: Semi-auto Survival
description:
Semi-auto Survival is a difficult bullet-hell game I made for a 48hr game jam based on the piece of music that the game follows. The song is Lumen Suum Reiecta by Miroist of of their album "Curve" which can be downloaded for free from http://miroist.com/ .

The ship controls are on the mouse and your HP is your score. Build up as much as you can by the end of the game in order to survive the final waves. Good luck!

Support Miroist's music if you can!
